ygData.subject: Re: songs and pets
ygData.msgSnippet: ... singing ... But ... the ... I ll have to test this, but I don t remember being attacked by my GF s pet unless I sang an AE song AFTER she went LD... The
ygData.messageBody:
> >Another newbie question here.
> >
> >My hubby has changed from playing a monk to playing a human shadowknight
> >(he secretly plans on revolting from his God - shhh). Now that he can
> >make a pet, I need to worry about what songs are bad to play when his
> >pet is around. Do songs like the Chords of Dissonance affect the pet?
> >Will the pet also run fast when I'm playing Selo's?
> >
> >Jerrilia
> >Bard of the 9th song
> >Luclin
>
>
> Pets are treated as non-party members for our songs. So if you are
singing
> AE attack songs the pet will get hit, but not be effected by the song.
But
> you will be added to the pets hate list, so if the pet's master goes LD
the
> pet will aggro on you.
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

I'll have to test this, but I don't remember being attacked by my GF's pet
unless I sang an AE song AFTER she went LD...

The only other song to worry about is obvious.... Invis. Not that I
haven't accidentally killed pets on numerous occasions. :)

Selo's will NOT affect the pet, nor will any other "Party" songs. The pet
normally will catch up before too long, tho. :)

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony
